title: Pumpkin soup with pumpkin seed bread
description: Make the most of any leftover pumpkin pulp with this hearty recipe.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz olive oil, plus extra for greasing
1kg/2lb 4oz pumpkin, peeled and cut into 1cm/½in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, to serve
